job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongForceX is seeking a Software Engineer for our client in Suwanee GA This is a fulltime Direct Hire positionstrongppbrppQUALIFICATIONSpulliRequires at least 1 year relevant experienceliliMust be a US person US citizen or Green CardliliAdaptable Flexible Ability to Learn  must be able to work with different architecture and software liliExperience with creative problemsolving  must be able to overcome obstacles with a unique perspective to benefit the teamliliTeam Player  must be able to accept a role in a team and work well together sharing goals effort and not afraid to ask for assistanceliliExperience with C and C programmingliliExperience with 3D software development Gaming Simulation or Commercial  experience in using modern 3D development software and understanding of enginerelated optimization limitation and strengthsliliExperience with objectoriented and componentoriented programmingliliExperience with database management  interfacing with a database to external software for handling large amounts of saveload and data managementliliExperience of programing with 3rd party SDK and API  utilizing 3rd party hardware and softwareliliExperience with Unity  as well as packages C and prefab managementliulpbrppEDUCATIONnbsppulliEngineering degree in computer science or relevant fieldliul
